casebody.data:
No. 09-10560. Leonard Bastida, Petitioner v. James M. LeBlanc, Secretary, Louisiana Department of Public Safety and Corrections, et al. 562 U.S. 846, 131 S. Ct. 90,

178 L. Ed. 2d 57,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5982. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 372 Fed. Appx. 443.
